00061 /**
00062  *      \brief  Constructor
00063  *
00064  *      \param  argc    argc from main function
00065  *      \param  argv    argv from main function
00066  */
00067 CL_Cuda::CL_Cuda( int argc, char** argv )
00068 {
00069 
00070 
00071         pd = new CL_Cuda_private();
00072 
00073         cudaDeviceReset();
00074 
00075         checkError(cuInit(0));
00076 
00077 //      int total = 0;
00078 //      cudaGetDeviceCount( &total );
00079 //      fprintf(stderr, "Total devices: %d\n", total);
00080 //
00081         pd->devID=0;
00082         cudaSetDevice(pd->devID);
00083 
00084     int total = 0;
00085     checkError(cuDeviceGetCount(&total));
00086     fprintf(stderr, "Total devices: %d\n", total);
00087 
00088 
00089     checkError(cuDeviceGet(&pd->device, 0));
00090 
00091 
00092     checkError(cuDeviceGetName( pd->name, 256, pd->device));
00093     fprintf(stderr, "Select device: %s\n", pd->name);
00094 
00095     // get compute capabilities and the devicename
00096     pd->major = 0; pd->minor = 0;
00097     checkError( cuDeviceComputeCapability(&pd->major, &pd->minor, pd->device));
00098     fprintf(stderr, "Compute capability: %d.%d\n", pd->major, pd->minor);
00099 
00100     pd->global_mem = 0;
00101     checkError( cuDeviceTotalMem(&pd->global_mem, pd->device));
00102     fprintf(stderr, "Global memory: %llu MB\n", (unsigned long long)(pd->global_mem >> 20));
00103     if(pd->global_mem > (unsigned long long)4*1024*1024*1024L)
00104         fprintf(stderr, "64-bit Memory Address support\n");
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108     checkError(cuCtxCreate(&pd->context, 0, pd->device));
00109         //checkError(cuCtxGetCurrent(&pd->context));
00110 
00111     pd->devID=0;
00112     //cudaSetDevice(pd->devID);
00113 
00114 
00115     pd->fd = open("/dev/"GPUMEM_DRIVER_NAME, O_RDWR, 0);
00116     if(pd->fd < 0)
00117     {
00118         printf("Error open file %s\n", "/dev/"GPUMEM_DRIVER_NAME);
00119         throw( "Error /dev/gpumem");
00120     }
00121 
00122 }

00132 //! Allocate buffer in CUDA memory and map it in BAR1 space
00133 void CL_Cuda::AllocateBar1Buffer( int sizeOfKb, BAR1_BUF *pAdr )
00134 {
00135 
00136         size_t size = sizeOfKb * 1024;
00137     gpudma_lock_t lock;
00138     gpudma_state_t *state = 0;
00139     unsigned int flag = 1;
00140         CUdeviceptr dptr = 0;
00141         int statesize = 0;
00142         int res = -1;
00143 
00144         int thLevel=0; // Level of local throw
00145 
00146     try
00147         {
00148 
00149         if( 0xA00!=pAdr->state)
00150         {
00151                 fprintf(stderr, "BAR1_BUF is busy. state=0x%.3X != 0xA00\n",  pAdr->state );
00152                 throw(0);
00153         }
00154         pAdr->state=0xA01;
00155 
00156     CUresult status = cuMemAlloc(&dptr, size);
00157     if(wasError(status)) {
00158         throw(thLevel);
00159     }
00160     thLevel++;
00161 
00162     fprintf(stderr, "Allocate memory address: 0x%llx\n",  (unsigned long long)dptr);
00163 
00164     status = cuPointerSetAttribute(&flag, CU_POINTER_ATTRIBUTE_SYNC_MEMOPS, dptr);
00165     if(wasError(status)) {
00166         throw(thLevel); //goto do_free_memory;
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170     // TODO: add kernel driver interaction...
00171     lock.addr = dptr;
00172     lock.size = size;
00173     res = ioctl(pd->fd, IOCTL_GPUMEM_LOCK, &lock);
00174     if(res < 0) {
00175         fprintf(stderr, "Error in IOCTL_GPUDMA_MEM_LOCK\n");
00176         throw(thLevel); // goto do_free_attr;
00177     }
00178 
00179 
00180     pAdr->phy_addr= new uint64_t[lock.page_count];
00181     pAdr->app_addr= new void*[lock.page_count];
00182     thLevel++;
00183 
00184     statesize = (lock.page_count*sizeof(uint64_t) + sizeof(struct gpudma_state_t));
00185     state = (struct gpudma_state_t*)malloc(statesize);
00186     if(!state) {
00187         throw(thLevel); // goto do_free_attr;
00188     }
00189     memset(state, 0, statesize);
00190     state->handle = lock.handle;
00191     state->page_count = lock.page_count;
00192     res = ioctl(pd->fd, IOCTL_GPUMEM_STATE, state);
00193     if(res < 0) {
00194         fprintf(stderr, "Error in IOCTL_GPUDMA_MEM_UNLOCK\n");
00195         throw(thLevel);// goto do_unlock;
00196     }
00197 
00198     fprintf(stderr, "Page count 0x%lx\n", state->page_count);
00199     fprintf(stderr, "Page size 0x%lx\n", state->page_size);
00200 
00201     pAdr->page_count=state->page_count;
00202     pAdr->page_size=state->page_size;
00203     pAdr->cuda_addr=(void*)dptr;
00204     pAdr->sizeOfBytes=size;
00205 
00206 
00207     for(unsigned ii=0; ii<state->page_count; ii++) {
00208         if( state->page_count<16 )
00209          fprintf(stderr, "%02d: 0x%lx\n", ii, state->pages[ii]);
00210         void* va = mmap(0, state->page_size, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, pd->fd, (off_t)state->pages[ii]);
00211         if(va == MAP_FAILED ) {
00212              fprintf(stderr, "%s(): %s\n", __FUNCTION__, strerror(errno));
00213              va = 0;
00214              throw(thLevel);
00215         } else {
00216             //fprintf(stderr, "%s(): Physical Address 0x%lx -> Virtual Address %p\n", __FUNCTION__, state->pages[i], va);
00217                 pAdr->app_addr[ii]=va;
00218                 pAdr->phy_addr[ii]=state->pages[ii];
00219         }
00220     }
00221     pAdr->state=0xA05; // Success
00222     fprintf(stderr, "CL_Cuda::AllocateBar1Buffer() - buffer id=%d is allocated, size=%d kB \n",  pAdr->id, sizeOfKb );
00223         } catch( int n )
00224         {
00225                 switch( n )
00226                 {
00227 
00228                 case 2:
00229                         delete pAdr->phy_addr; pAdr->phy_addr=NULL;
00230                         delete pAdr->app_addr; pAdr->app_addr=NULL;
00231                 case 1:
00232                         cuMemFree(dptr);
00233                 default:
00234                         pAdr->state=0xA00;
00235                         break;
00236                 }
00237                 throw(0);
00238         } catch( ... )
00239         {
00240                 throw( 0 );
00241         }
00242 }
00243 
00244 //! Release buffer from BAR1 space and from CUDA memory
00245 void CL_Cuda::FreeBar1Buffer( BAR1_BUF *pAdr )
00246 {
00247 
00248         if( 0xA05!=pAdr->state)
00249         {
00250                 fprintf(stderr, "BAR1_BUF is not allocate. state=0x%.3X != 0xA05\n",  pAdr->state );
00251                 throw(0);
00252         }
00253         pAdr->state = 0xA10;
00254 
00255         // unmap virtual address
00256         void *va;
00257         for(unsigned ii=0; ii<pAdr->page_count; ii++)
00258         {
00259                 va=pAdr->app_addr[ii];
00260                 munmap(va, pAdr->page_size);
00261                 pAdr->app_addr[ii]=NULL;
00262         }
00263 
00264         // free CUDA memory
00265         cuMemFree((CUdeviceptr)(pAdr->cuda_addr));
00266 
00267         // free array
00268         delete pAdr->app_addr; pAdr->app_addr=NULL;
00269         delete pAdr->phy_addr; pAdr->phy_addr=NULL;
00270 
00271         // Set empty state of pAdr
00272         pAdr->state = 0xA00;
00273         fprintf(stderr, "CL_Cuda::FreeBar1Buffer() - buffer id=%d is cleared \n",  pAdr->id);
00274 
00275 }

00277 
00278 void checkError(CUresult status)
00279 {
00280     if(status != CUDA_SUCCESS) {
00281         const char *perrstr = 0;
00282         CUresult ok = cuGetErrorString(status,&perrstr);
00283         if(ok == CUDA_SUCCESS) {
00284             if(perrstr) {
00285                 fprintf(stderr, "info: %s\n", perrstr);
00286             } else {
00287                 fprintf(stderr, "info: unknown error\n");
00288             }
00289         }
00290         throw(0);
00291     }
00292 }
00293 
00294 bool wasError(CUresult status)
00295 {
00296     if(status != CUDA_SUCCESS) {
00297         const char *perrstr = 0;
00298         CUresult ok = cuGetErrorString(status,&perrstr);
00299         if(ok == CUDA_SUCCESS) {
00300             if(perrstr) {
00301                 fprintf(stderr, "info: %s\n", perrstr);
00302             } else {
00303                 fprintf(stderr, "info: unknown error\n");
00304             }
00305         }
00306         return true;
00307     }
00308     return false;
00309 }
